content.question: By what factor should the length of the rod be increased to increase the rotational inertia of the rod-sphere system to <math alttext="2 I" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 1 over the square root to 2, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
